title: 18 Chic Bags on Amazon Under $100
description: If you don't have time to sift through the thousands of fashion finds on Amazon, fear not; we're here to assist. Unbeknownst to many, the digital retailer offers all sorts of stylish bags deserving of your attention. Whether you're looking for an affordable but chic clutch to complete your wedding guest look or a uniquely shaped bag to wear year-round, we guarantee the site has a ton of options bound to pique your interest. Ahead, we curated your ultimate shopping guide to all the coolest bags on Amazon, including clutches, crossbodies, totes, and more. You might even spot some brands you already know, like JW Pei or Amazon's The Drop. These on-trend essentials are purchases you'll look forward to showing off for years to come, whether on vacation, at special events, or maybe even at work. While we've uncovered a trove of investment-worthy designer bags on Amazon, we've narrowed this list to focus on our favorite bags that cost less than $100. Couple that with the fact that they're also available on Amazon Prime for super fast, free shipping. Keep scrolling to shop our picks.
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best and most unique bags Amazon has to offer.

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

If you don't have time to sift through the thousands of fashion finds on Amazon, fear not; we're here to assist. Unbeknownst to many, the digital retailer offers all sorts of stylish bags deserving of your attention. Whether you're looking for an affordable but chic clutch to complete your wedding guest look or a uniquely shaped bag to wear year-round, we guarantee the site has a ton of options bound to pique your interest.

Ahead, we curated your ultimate shopping guide to all the coolest bags on Amazon, including clutches, crossbodies, totes, and more. You might even spot some brands you already know, like JW Pei or Amazon's The Drop. These on-trend essentials are purchases you'll look forward to showing off for years to come, whether on vacation, at special events, or maybe even at work. While we've uncovered a trove of investment-worthy designer bags on Amazon, we've narrowed this list to focus on our favorite bags that cost less than $100. Couple that with the fact that they're also available on Amazon Prime for super fast, free shipping. Keep scrolling to shop our picks.

Best Clear Bag

WJCD Women Clear Purse ($17, originally $20)

Whether you're attending a concert or festival that requires a clear bag or simply appreciating the aesthetic, this one won't disappoint. It features a latch-top closure and a removable gold chain strap. If you like the shape and acrylic material but prefer an opaque design, it is available in non-transparent options as well.

Best Woven Vegan Leather Bag

Ann Bully Woven Tote Bag ($17)

This chic handbag is perfect if you need a stylish, functional option with enough space to keep essentials like your wallet, phone, and makeup secure. Ideal for work or everyday use, it's also available in black.

Best Metallic Bag

Metallic Evening Bag ($19)

This sleek metallic evening bag definitely costs less than your last food delivery order. As much as we love the silver, it comes in a total of seven colors, including pink, blue, green, and orange. One shopper who rated it five stars wrote that they "originally bought this for an event, but I have been surprised at how many times I've used it. I get compliments on it almost every time."

Best '90s-Inspired Bag

Barabum Retro Classic Clutch ($20)

The '90s-inspired shoulder bag is trendy without being over the top, and it comes in monochromes as well as an eye-catching crocodile texture.

Best Sequined Clutch

Babeyond Clutch ($24)

This sequined clutch adds instant sparkle to any outfit. Sling it on your wrist to dress up jeans for dinner or wear it with an evening gown to a wedding. Our editor tested it out and is amazed by how often she reaches for it. For more details and photos, read her Babeyond Clutch review.

Editor Quote: "The sequins add eye-catching sparkle, but the black color and small shape keep it from feeling gaudy. It plays well with other shiny pieces like silk skirts, studded booties, and rhinestone jewelry, and it elevates basics like jeans and a black turtleneck for dinner and drinks. It has a zipper closure, so you can rest assured that the contents of your purse will stay safe, and a magnetic snap closure that holds the knot shape." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Knot Bag

The Drop Avalon Shopper Tote Bag ($26, originally $29)

How fun is this knot-shaped clutch? It's versatile enough to suit so many different occasions, and it's easy to carry, according to several Amazon reviewers. One person wrote: "It sits nicely on my wrist, and I wear it like a wristlet... with a twist."

Best Top-Handle Bag

The Drop Women's Diana Top Handle Crossbody Bag ($26, originally $32)

As much as we love using this sleek bag as a crossbody, the strap is easily removable to convert it to a top handle. It has a magnetic closure that ensures secure and convenient fastening.

Best Slouchy Bag

Montana West Hobo Bag ($26)

Slouchy bags are having a moment, but many of them are outrageously priced. Here's an affordable take on the trend, featuring two spacious inner compartments, two zipper pockets, and 11 (!) slip pockets for your wallet and other small essentials.

Best Clutch

Menurra Women Acrylic Evening Clutch ($29, originally $32)

No, you don't have to spend hundreds to get your hands on a unique evening clutch, evidenced by this rectangular style. It mimics a shell with lustrous swirls, and its chic closures adds to its visual appeal. The inside is lined with smooth cotton and it comes with two detachable chains.

Best Faux Fur Bag

The Drop Women's Addison Soft Volume Top-Handle Bag ($33)

This faux fur bag has garnered lots of praise from Amazon shoppers, who attest that it garners tons of compliments and is well-made. If the faux fur aesthetic isn't for you, but you still admire the silhouette, it's also available in faux leather options.

Best Bamboo Handbag

Miuco Bamboo Handbag ($36-$41)

This bag is an unofficial dupe for a similar-looking high-end style. It comes in a small and a large version and is the perfect finishing touch for vacation 'fits.

Best Puffer Bag

NAARIIAN Puffer Shoulder Bag ($38)

If you're eager to hop on the puffer bag trend, you can't go wrong with this style. Its woven design mirrors high-end versions for a fraction of the price, and it's lightweight, featuring a magnetic closure and an adjustable buckle.

Best Rattan Bag

Novum Crafts Rattan Bag ($40, originally $45)

No tropical vacation is complete without a rattan handbag; this one is no exception. It's undeniably versatile and features a leather shoulder strap and a snap closure.

Best Beaded Handbag

Miuco Women's Beaded Handbag ($47, originally $50)

People are bound to think this handbag is designer. It's intricately woven with beads and is both well-structured and sturdy. While the cream version exudes an air of elegance, it's worth noting that it's available in a range of colors, including eye-catching options like blue and lime green.

Best Tote Bag

Wrangler Tote Bag ($47)

Wrangler jeans are hard to beat, but the same goes for this tote bag, which shoppers are rightfully going wild for. (At the time of writing, it rightfully takes the number one spot among all of Amazon's bestselling bags.) It's decked out in a fun Aztec print with a removable guitar strap to transform it into a crossbody.

Best Woven Bag

Queenoris Woven Bag ($59)

This vegan leather woven tote is minimal without being boring. The versatile beige color can be worn with everything, while the textured material helps it to pop against a monochromatic outfit. It comes with a clutch that can fit your phone, card wallet, and keys. You can grab it in 10 colors, including three patterned options.

Best Round Top-Handle Bag

JW PEI Women's Abacus Bag ($89)

This half-moon-shaped hobo bag has no shortage of fun details, from its playful rings to its puffy faux leather silhouette. It comes in several colors, ranging from neutrals like the brown option pictured here to bold brights and fun textures, including a denim-bedazzled one and faux fur.

— Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Balim Tezel

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has over seven years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. She was previously the senior beauty editor at Grazia USA and the style and beauty editor at Us Weekly. Now freelancing, her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, Marie Claire, and more.

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Balim Tezel (she/her) is a shopping updates editor at PS and the founder of Maison des Nus, a New York-based affordable luxury brand. She graduated from Northwestern University's Medill School of Journalism.
